Package lib.homies.framework.spigot.scheduler

Class SpigotSchedulerService

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.spigot.scheduler.SpigotSchedulerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
SchedulerService
public class SpigotSchedulerService extends Object implements SchedulerService
Spigot-specific implementation of the SchedulerService interface. This class leverages Bukkit's BukkitScheduler to manage and execute tasks synchronously and asynchronously, with support for delays and repetitions.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • runLater

      public HomiesTask runLater(Runnable task, long delay)
      Runs a task once after a specified delay on the main server thread.
      Specified by:
      runLater in interface SchedulerService
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable to execute.
      delay - The delay before the task runs, in server ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the scheduled task.

    • runRepeating

      public HomiesTask runRepeating(Runnable task, long delay, long period)
      Runs a task repeatedly on the main server thread after an initial delay.
      Specified by:
      runRepeating in interface SchedulerService
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable to execute.
      delay - The initial delay before the first execution, in server ticks.
      period - The period between subsequent executions, in server ticks.
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the scheduled task.

    • addToGroup

      public void addToGroup(String group, HomiesTask task)
      Adds a scheduled task to a named group. Tasks in a group can be cancelled together.
      Specified by:
      addToGroup in interface SchedulerService
      Parameters:
      group - The name of the task group.
      task - The HomiesTask to add to the group.
